name: Walker
setup: Humanoid character with many joints walking over flat ground.
goal: Walk in the desired direction at the desired speed without falling.

agents.description: Ten humanoid agents each learning from the same policy.

terms: Reward increases when body velocity matches the target velocity.
Reward increases when facing direction aligns with the goal direction.
Reward is structured so balance, direction, and speed must all be good simultaneously.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Large vector of joint positions, velocities, and body state.
behavior_parameters.actions: 39 continuous actions controlling target rotations and strengths for all joints.
